data.text: @312Will A paper ticket has gone the way of the dodo,in my experience but I’m holding on to a few as a reminder. Safe travels Amigo!
@312Will I was there! I even live there now(part of the year), about a 5 min drive to the stadium
Anywho there's also some sand in this side pocket which I'm also guessing is from Brazil seven years ago. I'm kinda terrible at unpacking.
While packing I found my 2014 World Cup Brazil ticket for Italy vs Uruguay. You remember... it's the one that Luis Suarez bit Giorgio Chiellini in the ear lmao. 😅 https://t.co/7QMHXvxRZo
@vr_sam Well then, sir. Perhaps I'll have to sortie on down. 🍺🍺
@312Will So jealous of your trip! I was just there in August ❤️🇬🇧
@312Will There’s a train to Brighton with a lovely view across Sussex Weald from a viaduct ;)
